long_description: The quality of the Arc'teryx Accelerator Zip-Neck is unmistakable: You'll see it every time you head out for your cool-weather workouts. Substantial, stretchy fabric keeps warmth close to your skin, wicks moistures, breathes well and dries quickly. Fabric protects skin from too much UV light with a UPF rating of 45. Zip neck collar ventilates in an instant. Flatlock seams, anatomic shaping and underarm gussets combine to make the Accelerator very comfortable to wear. Reflective highlights enhance visibility in dim light. The Arc'teryx Accelerator Zip-Neck top features an athletic fit.
short_description: The quality of the Arc'teryx Accelerator Zip-Neck is unmistakable: You'll see it every time you head out for your cool-weather workouts.
